articles.author: willswire
articles.title: Show HN: Speed Reader for Safari
articles.description: ‎Speed Reader alters text on the web so that the most important parts of each word are bolded.  By directing a reader's gaze only to the initial highlighted letters, the brain is able to auto-complete the remaining part of the word.

articles.author: alpinegizmo
articles.title: Is it possible to disable iCloud K… | Apple Developer Forums
articles.description:
We got an interesting question on the Developer Forums:
> Is it possible to disable iCloud Keychain synchronization of passkeys?

Our answer to this question is really important to understand. It gets to the heart of passkeys being a password replacement.
articles.content: Passkeys on Apple platforms require iCloud Keychain. One of the core goals of passkeys is to be a replacement for passwords. Despite their faults, one of the best properties of passwords is their inc… [+477 chars]
